name: Starbird
description:
Starbird is a game made for the Go Godot Jam 2. Take indirect control of a multiversal energy generation group of extradimensional beings. Adjust the sliders so your collection of universes-turned-into-generators grows while fighting back the bad guys!

The circles are various universes spread throughout the multiverse, and your network of them will grow. They passively generate energy when controlled, the growing flare, and distribute it across the network.

Defense focuses energy towards making connections between universes you already control.

Expansion focuses energy towards making connections to new universes.

Offence focuses energy towards creating trios of little extradimensional spacecraft to drain the energy out of enemy universes, disconnecting them from the their network.

The font is Karnivore by Apostrophic Lab, taken from fontspace.

Also uploaded here on GOTM.IO but it broke the textures isn't keeping the resolution at 1024x600.
